metadata.title: CVE-2025-23013 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In Yubico pam-u2f before 1.3.1, local privilege escalation can sometimesoccur. This product implements a Pluggable Authentication Module (PAM) thatcan be deployed to support authentication using a YubiKey or other FIDOcompliant authenticators on macOS or Linux. This software package has anissue that allows for an authentication bypass in some configurations. Anattacker would require the ability to access the system as an unprivilegeduser. Depending on the configuration, the attacker may also need to knowthe user's password.

criterions.comment: pam-u2f package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
